channel.title: Authors on Landfried
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Landfried

item.description: PhD in computer science and MSc in social anthropologist, I am a Bayesian Inference Engineer working on machine learning, software development and causal reasoning. In contrast to ad-hoc solutions, the strict application of probability theory (Bayesian approach) guarantees inter-subjective agreements in contexts of uncertainty, the foundation of empirical truths. %In addition, it allows to focus attention on the real problem since the specification of causal models is done using intuitive graphical methods that are accessible to everyone.
